description:
Company Description

West-Com & T.V., Inc. delivers healthcare technology solutions to facilities within our care community. As an end-to-end systems integrator, we offer customizable and scalable products to improve communication, collaboration, workflow, and trust between care providers, patients, family members, and support personnel. Our offices and support centers are located in California, Arizona, Oregon, Nevada, and Hawaii.

Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Senior Sales Executive. The Senior Sales Executive will be responsible for promoting and selling West-Com & T.V., Inc. solutions to healthcare organizations. The role involves identifying and managing leads, developing and executing sales strategies, and building and maintaining relationships with clients. The Senior Sales Executive will also be responsible for ensuring customer satisfaction and helping to drive company growth.

Qualifications
• Proven track record of sales success in the healthcare industry
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
• Strong problem-solving and negotiation skills
• Ability to work independently and remotely
• Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office suite
• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or Healthcare Administration
• Experience with Nurse Call, Telehealth, Digital Whiteboards, Mobile Phone Apps, Intercom, Clinic Flow, Radio Paging, Television, RTLS/Asset Tracking/Staff Duress, Infant Safety, Time & Temperature Monitoring, or Analytics and Reporting is a plus
